casebody.data:
MICHAEL COLLIGAN, Plaintiff and Respondent, v. EDWARD P. SCOTT et al., Defendants and Appellants.

Before Barbour, Ch. J., Curtis, and Van Vorst, JJ.

Decided December 31, 1873.

Action for work and labor.

*575John C. Connor, Jr., for appellants. Erastus Cooke, for respondent.

Opinion by Curtis, J. Barbour, Ch. J., and Van Vorst, J., concurred.

Appeal from judgment in favor of plaintiff.

Judgment affirmed.
